entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Java.Lang.IllegalStateException when resuming the App from an Android Autofill Service #18121
  • Maui.essentials 7.096 incompatible with Android GooglePlayServices Nugets like recaptcha #18118
  • Something isn't working #18116
  • Duplicate file errors not on all the Maui* things #18115
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] Setting MaximumTrackColor on Slider has no effect when using Mac Idiom #18111
    Backlog
  • [Mac Catalyst] Setting CancelButtonColor on SearchBar has no effect when using Mac Idiom #18110
    Backlog
  • CarouselView with Border flickers #18104
  • .Net8 Regression - Button background does not override implicit visualstate style #18103
    .NET 8 GA
  • Padding or Margin on FlexLayout #18102
  • [Windows] How to style the ScrollBar of the ScrollView #18101
  • The font size of a label with formattedtext is not the same as the fontsize of a label with regular text #18098
    Backlog
  • When debugging on the Android emulator, the thread occasionally interrupts, causing the app to crash. This issue can be consistently reproduced.安卓模拟器调试时线程有时会中断，app闪退，稳定复现 #18097
  • TabbedPage: Child Content overlapping Tabbed Page Menu #18096
    .NET 8 GA
  • CheckBox does not support ControlTemplates #18094
    Backlog
  • Entry bug—height grows on every input event #18092
    .NET 8 GA
  • Button CornerRadius is not working with BackgroundColor #18090
    Backlog

Closed

  • MAUI Blazor RC2 breaks <script src="foo.js"> type tag includes within body of .razor files #18065
    .NET 8 GA
  • Document issues with using ValueConverter in CollectionView #11975
    Backlog
  • Application crash when restoring multiple windows on Mac Catalyst #18093
  • clang++ exited with code 1 #18072
  • .NET MAUI App option doesn't appear on create project #18089
  • New Bug in .NET 8: GetVisualTreeElements(point) is now broken and won't run at all, says "MauiContext should have been set on parent." #18070

PullRequests

Created

  • [WinUI] Fixes window blinking when resizing #18120
    area/desktop 🖥️
  • Fix 17210 #18119
    community ✨
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Set Nullable=enable in Control Samples projects #18114
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • Rework the Label mappers for FormattedText #18105
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • [tests] Enable Parallel tests back #18099
    area/infrastructure 🏗️

Merged

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Update Blazor Hybrid template to match ASP.NET Core Blazor Web template #18113
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] [net8.0] Reverting default item and globbing updates #18112
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Update with correct net7 version #18100
    .NET 8 GA
  • [ci] Dependabot should only use nuget.org #18109
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Revert "Run template tests run in parallel to save 15min of run time" #18077
    area/templates 📄

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix wrong Layout from hidden CollectionView #17659
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 GA
  • Setup legacy mappers #18087
    .NET 8 GA
  • Support finding nearest TFM to collect assets from #18068
    area/single project ☝️, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix: Binding doesn't respect special IValueConverter return values #12060
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️, community ✨, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [X] connect the right method to the event handler #18043
    .NET 8 GA
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #18080
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17956
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1
  • Add remapping extensions for core #17918
    area/controls 🎮, control-image, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Implement gestures on Spans #17731
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-label, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR2
  • [Windows] Fix issue using Connectivity from a background thread #17903
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Allow tap gesture in ContentView #17482
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, Under Consideration
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button IconSize #16164
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, control-image, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.2045.28 to 1.0.2088.41 #18084
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Fix shadow scaling issue #17902
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (1) #17669
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • `sealed` some `internal` classes in `Controls.Core` that are not inherited from (2) #17671
    area/architecture, community ✨
  • Force ShapeHandler to exist when adding shape to border #18076
    area/drawing ✏️, Under Consideration
  • iOS Keyboard Scrolling Improvements and UITests (not from fork) #17670
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, stale, area/keyboard, Under Consideration
  • Fixed Path size calculations #17722
    area/drawing ✏️, do-not-merge, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Show the Raw HTML for Html Label in case of error #17470
    area/controls 🎮, stale, Under Consideration
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
    s/pr-needs-author-input
  • set the parents to installer #18086
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, .NET 8 GA
